017package org.apache.juneau.rest.widget;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
021
022/**
023 * Widget that places a powered-by-Juneau message on the page.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * The variable it resolves is <js>"$W{PoweredByJuneau}"</js>.
027 *
028 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
029 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlPredefinedWidgets">Predefined Widgets</a>
030 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/HtmlWidgets">Widgets</a>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class PoweredByJuneau extends Widget {
034
035   /**
036    * Returns an Apache Juneau image tag hyperlinked to <js>"http://juneau.apache.org"</js>
037    */
038   @Override /* Widget */
039   public String getHtml(RestRequest req, RestResponse res) {
040      UriResolver r = req.getUriResolver();
041      return "<a href='http://juneau.apache.org'><img style='float:right;padding-right:20px;height:32px' src='"+r.resolve("servlet:/htdocs/images/juneau.png")+"'>";
042   }
043}
